text: (upbeat music)
- My name is Saurabh Baji,

and I'm the Senior Vice President
of Engineering at Cohere.

At Cohere, we build large
language model technology
for enterprises.

Command is Cohere's flagship
large language model,

which is tuned for responding
to user instructions
with thoughtful human-like responses.
It's available in multiple sizes
so that you get the best quality
at the lowest latency and cost efficiency.

Command is good at a variety
of practical use cases
like conversation, question answering,
summarizing large and complex reports,

copywriting, both long
form and short form,
be it technical, business, or creative,
information extraction, and work.

As an enterprise, you can
immediately use Command

for your applications like
customer service chat,
summarizing patient-doctor conversations,

writing product descriptions,
and drafting press releases.
You can answer questions on your own data
so that you get insightful factual answers
that are grounded in your own documents.

So knowledge workers
can do their jobs better
and be highly productive.

Command is ranked among the
best large language models
in the world by HELM

or the Holistic Evaluation
of Language Models benchmark
by Stanford University.
AWS takes away a lot of the heavy lifting
to be able to do things bigger and better
while ensuring security.

Using Command on Amazon Bedrock
lets you easily and quickly
use our best-in-class generative model
with your data on AWS

without having to worry
about infrastructure.

To know more, visit us on
our website at cohere.com.
(upbeat music)
